A FICKLE AND FINITE RESOURCE: When a standard character is KO'd, give • ▪▪ịẬị▪▪ • a Crystal token. If that character has the Mystical keyword, give 2 instead. FREE: Remove a Crystal token. If you do, choose • ▪▪ịẬị▪▪ • or an adjacent friendly character with the X-Men keyword and a standard damage power. The chosen character can use that power until your next turn.
